metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13232 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
Info-ZIP UnZip 6.0 mishandles the overlapping of files inside a ZIPcontainer, leading to denial of service (resource consumption), aka a"better zip bomb" issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

unzip - 6.0-25ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unzip package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0-25ubuntu1').
